subject: Attn: you Online payment
body:
Attn: you Online payment
Your payment of $11.5Million USD has been released and deposited with
JP Morgan Chase Bank NEW YORK under care of Mr. Carry Switzer, for
immediate release to you via Online Account whereby you can make
transfer by yourself to any account of your choice. Kindly contact
Chase Bank manager now here:
But
 the bank has also stated that before you transfer your funds of
the USD $11.5Million today to your account you well make the fee sum
of the $75
 Once the payment of $75 has been received, then the Chase
Bank NEW YORK well send your TRANSFER CODE/TRANSFER PIN to you which
you would use to make the final transfer to any bank for your
yourself.
Contact full Information Below.
Full Name:::
Home Address:::
Country:::::
P.O. Box Address:::
Postal Address:::
Telephone Number:::
Age and Sex:::
Whats App Number::::
Please if you alive life reply this message and forward with your
Contact full Information  to you received your online transfer fist
payment of $8000.00 in 1hours as soon as you massage is received today
and 
try to get the $75 fee iTunes card Or Steam wallet card of the $75
then scratch the card and send card copies of the card to me OK..
Mr.Carry Switzer,
Thank you

subject: Re: Attn: you Online payment
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in helping me receive my payment. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the payment? What is it for and who is the sender?
2. Why do I need to make a fee payment before transferring the funds? Is there any specific reason for this?
3. Could you explain how the online account works? How can I ensure the security of my funds during the transfer process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Karen
